    Read a project descriptor from an XML file.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public ProjectDescriptor read(InputSource is,
                     DefinitionScope scope)
                       throws IOException
        Read a project descriptor from an XML input source.
        Parameters:
        is - the XML input source.
        scope - the definition scope of the file. If non null all elements will be assumed of the given scope. If null, the scope will be read from the file.
        Returns:
        the read descriptor.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure

      • read

        public ProjectDescriptor read(Path confFile,
                     DefinitionScope scope)
                       throws IOException
        Read a project descriptor from an XML file.

        Looks for an DescriptorWriter.CONF_ENCRYPT_FILE file in the same directory to determine encryption of the file.

        Parameters:
        confFile - The project.conf file path null means the project is in the conf file directory.
        scope - the definition scope of the file. If non null all elements will be assumed of the given scope. If null, the scope will be read from the file.
        Returns:
        the read descriptor.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure

      • setDefaultScope

        public ProjectDescriptorReader setDefaultScope(DefinitionScope defaultScope)
        Set the scope to set to read descriptor elements if no scope is specified either in the source nor in the call to read(InputSource, DefinitionScope).
        Parameters:
        defaultScope - the default scope.
        Returns:
        this for convenience.
